message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects its true value.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit too steep for me.  Would you consider $11,000?
I understand your position, Bob, but $11,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $12,500. This is my final offer.
